title: Design Studio-Based Science Leadership Self-Directed Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Scientific research methodologies and foundational leadership skills
context.additional_context: Project-based self-directed learning environment for science managers/leaders in corporate settings, emphasizing collaboration and iterative learning through personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously define scientific problems and creatively propose solutions in a design studio environment.
Learners can improve science project deliverables at least three times through peer feedback and reflective thinking.
Learners can complete team-based scientific problem-solving projects utilizing physical spaces and social interactions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
